gov.fnal.ppd.chat

Class MessageCarrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.chat.MessageCarrier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MessageCarrier
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class defines the different type of messages that will be exchanged between the Clients and the Server. When talking from a Java Client to a Java Server a lot easier to pass Java objects, no need to count bytes or to wait for a line feed at the end of the frame Taken from http://www.dreamincode.net/forums/topic/259777-a-simple-chat-program-with-clientserver-gui-optional/ on 5/12/2014
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
